entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
